review: Love Chromecast.. only issue is that i cant share out my webpages.. or documents like i can with Miracast. you would think that if Google would build miracast into the OS.. then it should be supported by Chromecast. but nope.. they are becoming like Apple where they want to control everything.. NOT GOOD.. i had to go and buy a Miracast dongle cause i didnt know Chromecast doesnt support it. other issue is that there is no way to setup the advance features of the networking piece like Android so you cannot define your own DNS servers.. which is a big issue for me.otherwise.. video streaming is very smooth..
